const boost::array< double, 9 > &  cov

private

Sets measurement covaraiance values from a 3x3 matrix

Parameters
transformA transform to be applied to the covariances
indexIndicies in the measurement vector which are to be populated by covaraiance values
covRow major 3x3 matrix of covariance values to set in the measurement covariance matrix
